Articles.Content:
It still sais it gimbals, but I'm not seeing it gimbal, and it's turning my ship no better than the T30. Is there something wrong with it since 0.20?

(and no, I haven't locked it's gimbal.)
If they broke its gimbal the engine will be completely useless. It's twr is way lower than the 30
I don't think they did. I have a soo with an LV-45 turning fine
